rules.name: allowTpHereRealPlayer
rules.description: Enables [/player xxx tp] to teleport to real player
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: allowTpToRealPlayer
rules.description: Enables [/player xxx tp] to teleport to real player
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: cceSuppressionCrashFix
rules.description: Fix CCE Suppression crashes

rules.name: commandLogger
rules.description: Print info log when players submit command

rules.name: commandTpHereFakePlayer
rules.description: Enables [/player xxx tp] to teleport to fake player
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: commandTpToFakePlayer
rules.description: Enables [/player xxx tp] to teleport to fake player
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: disabledEnderManPickupGoal
rules.description: Disable enderman pickup block goal

rules.name: disabledEnderManPlaceBlockGoal
rules.description: Disable enderman place block goal

rules.name: disabledEntityTick
rules.description: Disable entity tick(contains all entity and BlockEntity)

rules.name: disabledLayEggs
rules.description: Disable chicken lays eggs

rules.name: disabledNetherPortalSpawn
rules.description: Disable zombified piglin spawn in nether portal

rules.name: disabledUpdateSuppressionErrorStackTrace
rules.description: Disable error stack when update suppression.

rules.name: dropperCrashFix
rules.description: Dropper crash fix

rules.name: enableTpHerePrefixBlacklist
rules.description: Enable tp here prefix blacklist

rules.name: enableTpHerePrefixWhitelist
rules.description: Enable tp here prefix whitelist

rules.name: enableTpPrefixBlacklist
rules.description: Enable tp prefix blacklist

rules.name: enableTpPrefixWhitelist
rules.description: Enable tp prefix whitelist

rules.name: fixXpLevelBug
rules.description: Refresh xp level when player change world

rules.name: forceFakePlayerGameMode
rules.description: Force fake player gamemode

rules.name: optimizeFakePlayerSpawn
rules.description: Always spawn offline fake player to reduce lagging

rules.name: optimizePlayerConnect
rules.description: Handle player connect in a new thread to reduce the lag.

rules.name: optimizeTeleport
rules.description: Handle player teleport in a new thread to reduce the lag.

rules.name: removeAllCurseOfBindingArmorWhenPlayerDeadInWall
rules.description: Remove every armour which has `curse of binding` enchantment when player dead in wall (keepInventory must be true).

rules.name: unescapeChatMessage
rules.description: Unescape chat message. \u4e2d -> ä¸­
validators: Its a client command so can be issued and potentially be effective when connecting to non-carpet/vanilla servers. In these situations (on vanilla servers) it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect
